archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Governing Body
archimate:Principle.documentation: An official governing body within the Sovrin Foundation. The Sovrin Governance Framework Working Group is an example of a Sovrin Governing Body. The list of official Sovrin Governing Bodies is maintained as a Controlled Document of the Sovrin Governance Framework. See Appendix A of the Sovrin Governance Framework Master Document.
